Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.network

Class InterfaceNetwork

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.network.InterfaceNetwork
public class InterfaceNetwork extends Object
The InterfaceNetwork class is a connection between the client controller and the socket TCP/IP
